description.value:
You thrive when you are in front of an audience. You know how to hypnotize them, how to amuse them, how to inspire them. Your poems melt the hearts of those who listen, awakening their anger and joy, spreading laughter or sorrow. Your music invades their minds and seizes their pains. Your dance steps hypnotize, your humor stings. Whatever techniques you use, art is your whole life.

Skills: Acrobatics, Performance

Tools: disguise kit, one type of musical instrument

Equipment: one musical instrument (of your choice), a gift from an admirer (@UUID[Compendium.5e-complete-fr.5e-backgrounds.Item.iyWuZtYZX9XmJ0yP],@UUID[Compendium.5e-complete-fr.5e-backgrounds.Item.TzRDPXp50qoX1R1j],@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.vpenjFjUyEBLLlUc] ), a costume and a pouch containing 15 gp.

Feature: @UUID[Compendium.5e-complete-fr.5e-backgrounds.Item.Fcglj47i3MtZSuzc]{By Popular Demand}

Artistic Domain

A good artist is versatile, spicing up each of their performances with different acts. Choose one to three performance domains or roll on the table below to determine the artistic domain(s) you have most developed.

@UUID[Compendium.5e-complete-fr.5e-roll-tables.RollTable.wipL7VMDxlsjbbyS]{Artistic Domain (Artist)}

Suggested Personalities

Successful artists must be able to capture and hold the attention of their audience, so they tend to have bright or charismatic personalities. They often lean towards romanticism and elevate the practice of their art and the appreciation of beauty to an ideal.

@UUID[Compendium.5e-complete-fr.5e-roll-tables.RollTable.mkr5dbD0UpQ33FzC]{Trait (artist)}

@UUID[Compendium.5e-complete-fr.5e-roll-tables.RollTable.OSNyZHSDZs0L1c9R]{Ideal (artist)}

@UUID[Compendium.5e-complete-fr.5e-roll-tables.RollTable.j24M1iNOK6lUBaNo]{Bond (artist)}
